Actions.Name: Vortex
Actions.Description: All characters in range 2 of the [name] are shoved 1 towards or away from it.

Actions.Name: Battalion of Limbs
Actions.Effects: The [name] marks their attack target. This mark can be placed more than once and stacks indefinitely. For each stack of the mark, this attack deals +3 damage on hit or miss. A character can save against this mark at the end of their turn to clear all stacks, but only if they are not in range 2 of the [name].

Actions.Name: Blade Shield
Actions.Description: An ally in range is marked by the [name]. While marked and adjacent to the [name], they gain +1 boon on saves and resistance.

Actions.Name: Ball Lightning
Actions.AreaEffect: [fray] damage and characters must save or be slashed.

Actions.Name: Wind of Obliteration
Actions.Effects: The [name] rushes 1, then deals [D] to all adjacent characters, then shoves them 1. It gains phasing during this action and must take each of these dashes in the same direction. Characters can be affected multiple times.
